name: Avangar
description:
The game is a top-down shooting game, based on science fiction physics and drawing style / Voxel.

In Avangar, you are Harry, an agent who, for some reason, was thrown into one of several possibilities of movement. This place called "No Place" is a colored error from all of them Harry and the part does not work the times of change dimensions and creatures calls "Extraseres" of another dimension.

Features:

  1. Cartoon Voxel style.
  2. Tireless hordes of Extraseres
  3. In addition to the Extraseres, you have an empty portion around an area. If you are the boundary of the terrain, you are in the empty infinity of the dimension.

Controls:

WASD: Handling

Left-clicking: shooting

A: Reload

More information:

Keep in mind that this is an alpha version and then bugs, glitchs and does not have all the templates and animations in the game.

Or some mistake speak in the comments.

Give suggestions for the game.

Your opinion about balancing each wave is either too strong or too weak.

Status of Dev:

Card templates are disabled due to a last-minute error.

Weapon templates are activated.
